newsitem.title: USA: Forest City says to offer 1.955 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: Forest City says to offer 1.955 mln shrs.

text.p: Forest City Enterprises Inc said Thursday it filed a public offering of up to 1,955,000 shares of Class A common stock with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
The company said it anticipates the offering will be completed in the second quarter of 1997.
The company said underwriters include Goldman Sachs; Merrill Lynch; Credit Suisse First Boston; and McDonald & Co.
The company said the offering includes a potential option to be granted to the underwriters to purchase up to an additional 255,000 shares, solely to cover over-allotments.

The company said it will initially use proceeds to repay debt outstanding under its revolving credit facility. The company said any excess proceeds of the offering will be used for general corporate purposes.
The company said it expects to later use other proceeds to finance on-going development and construction activities.
Forest City is a national real estate company.
